title: Gold Star Family Day
context: [ยง8-3.6] Gold Star Family Day. The last Sunday in September shall be known as &ldquo;Gold Star Family Day&rdquo;, in recognition of the family members of the men and women who have given their lives for their country while serving with the armed forces of the United States in time of war or during a period of hostilities. This day is not and shall not be construed to be a state holiday. [L 2014, c 7, ยง2]
